item.title: NEAR One CEO X Account Hacked, Users Advised to Be Cautious
item.description: On September 5th, the official reminder of NEAR Protocol stated that the account @BowenWang18 of NEAR One CEO X was compromised by an external entity, and this account was used to post false information claiming to be giving away $1 million worth of NEAR.The Near team is currently working to restore the security of the account to ensure that no more risks are incurred. Once full control is regained, the Near team will issue an official update. In the meantime, please do not interact with or share the false post and stay vigilant.

item.title: After Non-Farm Payrolls Release, Whale Long on ETH Liquidated with Stop Loss, Losing $10.67 Million
item.description: On September 5th, based on Postmortem monitoring, the "Sell the HYPE then Long ETH Whale" was seized by FOMO and entered ETH after the NFP data. They liquidated their entire 52,800 ETH long position 15 minutes ago at a price of approximately $4,265, resulting in a loss of $10.67 million.

item.title: A Whale/Institution Sells 10,000 ETH, Profiting $73.96 Million from an ETH Swing Trade
item.description: On September 5th, according to Amberdata, a whale/institution that achieved a profit of $73.96 million by using an ETH flash loan sold 10,000 ETH through Wintermute within the past 1 hour. It then exchanged it for 44.31 million USDC and made a profit of $960,000.

item.title: If Bitcoin drops below $110,000, the mainstream CEX long liquidation pressure will reach $977 million
item.description: On September 5th, according to Coinglass data, in the event that Bitcoin drops below $110,000, the cumulative intensity of long liquidation on mainstream CEXs will reach $977 million.Conversely, if Bitcoin surges above $113,000, the cumulative intensity of short liquidation on mainstream CEXs will reach $975 million.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not precisely depict the number of contracts awaiting liquidation or the exact value of contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually signify the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring clusters, that is, intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart illustrates the extent to which the price of the underlying asset will be affected when it reaches a certain level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that when the price reaches that level, it will trigger a more intense reaction due to a liquidity cascade.

item.title: Bitcoin briefly drops below $111,000
item.description: On September 5th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly fell below $111,000 and is now trading at $111,170, with a 24-hour price change narrowing to 0.42%.

item.title: Bitcoin Temporarily Drops Below $112,000
item.description: On September 5th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly fell below $112,000 and is now trading at $112,005, with a 24-hour gain narrowed to 1.15%.

item.title: Trump: Powell Should Have Lowered Interest Rates Long Ago
item.description: September 5th: President Trump of the U.S. stated that Powell should have brought down interest rates a long time ago.

item.title: Kazakhstan Pilots Payment of Regulatory Fees in a USD Stablecoin
item.description: September 5th. According to Cointelegraph, the financial regulatory agency of Kazakhstan has granted permission for the payment of licensing and regulatory fees using USD-pegged stablecoins.The Astana Financial Services Authority (AFSA), which is the designated financial regulatory authority of the Astana International Financial Center (AIFC), has launched a project enabling AIFC members to utilize USD-pegged stablecoins for paying regulatory fees.The regulatory agency announced on Thursday at the local event "Astana Finance Days 2025" that the project has been officially launched and has signed a relevant Multilateral Memorandum of Understanding (MMoU) with the centralized cryptocurrency exchange platform Bybit.

item.title: US Bank: The Federal Reserve is expected to cut interest rates twice by 2025, compared to the previous expectation of no rate cuts.
item.description: On September 5th, Bank of America declared that it anticipates the Fed to reduce interest rates twice by 2025. This is in contrast to the previous expectation of no rate cuts. (Xinhua News Agency)

item.title: White House Economic Advisor: Fed Expected to Discuss Larger Rate Cut
item.description: On September 5th, the White House economic adviser Hassett (while referring to the Fed) stated that they would need to give consideration to the actions they would undertake. The Fed is anticipated to engage in a discussion regarding a more substantial rate cut. (FXStreet)
